title: Which universities offer degrees in veterinary science? - Quora
tags: Colleges and Universities in the United States of America

response.answer_text: I'll talk specifically about U.S colleges. If you're looking to study veterinary science, a few good colleges would be: 1) University of Georgia2) University of Florida3) Ohio State University4) University of Minnesota It's hard to take call since I don't know your profile, but a good college for you would be the one which offers the course that matches your area of interest, location preference, financial constraints, time constraints and other important aspects like ROI. All the best! :) [Source for Ranking: Schools Offering Veterinary Sciences Programs]
